question: Which state has recently launched an initiative to establish hotels to provide meals at subsidised price called 'Kudumbashree' hotels?
explanation:
The state government of Kerala has recently unveiled a scheme to establish hotels to provide meals at subsidised rates called \'Kudumbashree\' hotels. The announcement was made during the presentation of stateâ€™s budget.
The hotels are to be set up in in each of the 1034 local bodies and Kerala meals is to be available at a subsidised price of Rs 25. Kudumbashree is an initiative of the state government for poverty eradication and women empowerment.
